name: StarCraft II Mod - Zed
description:
I got the idea for this mod - let's say 1 or 2 years ago - just in the moment sc2 was revealed by blizzard. Z is an old game released 1996 by The Bitmap Brothers ( [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Z\_(video\_game](</linkout?remoteUrl=http%253a%252f%252fen.wikipedia.org%252fwiki%252fZ_(video_game>)) )

I look forward to make the trigger system as simple as possible, so other user, that don't know the galaxy editor so well could download standard maps of mine and create their own StarCraft II Mod - Zed - Multiplayer Maps

Otherside to the multiplayer part i will release the campaign of Z and Z: Steel Soldiers on my own. Also we plan do create a third part that will tell a new story on the z universe. Custom grafics and models in work.

Here are my stats of progress:

Gameplay: 100% Units: 50% Structures: 25%

\-mellowski

Tech Demos
